Package oauth_demo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessData
    Contains the Dropbox Oauth access token and related information.
    AppData
    Contains app key and secret for the demo app.
    Browser
    open a window in the default web browser
    CommonConfig
    Common configuration data (file paths)
    CommonTest  
    CommonTestDropbox  
    ConsoleLogger
    Log debug, information and error messages to the console.
    CsrfTokenStore
    Store session data in a file for use between steps of the redirect authorisation workflow.
    DropboxStatus
    This class contains status information used after completion of a workflow task.
    DropboxTools
    Static methods for performing some Dropbox actions (creating or printing files etc).
    DropboxWorkflowNoRedirect
    This class provides methods which implement the Dropbox No-Redirect workflow: noRedirectClientStart implements the start step.
    DropboxWorkflowRedirect
    This class provides methods which implement the Dropbox Redirect workflow: redirectClientStart implements the start step.
    HttpConfig
    Configuration for the local httpd server (for the redirect authorisation workflow).
    HttpdUrlHandler
    URL handler for the HTTP server.
    HttpLatestUrlFile
    Manage Latest URL File
    OauthClient
    This is the class which runs the Oauth demo client.
    OauthHttpd
    This class implements a simple HTTP server on the computer running the demo.
    TestCommonClasses  
    TestWorkflowTools  
    TimeNow
    Return the current time as a string or integer.
